summary: In this context, 2-methylbuta-1,3-diene, commonly known as isoprene, is mentioned alongside monoterpenes as part of a study measuring volatile organic compounds (VOCs) emitted from plants. Both compounds are classified as terpenes, which are significant in plant physiology and atmospheric chemistry. However, the specific relationship or interaction between isoprene and monoterpenes is not elaborated upon in the provided context.
